statements: UPDATE remote_work_expenses SET approval_status = 'Approved' WHERE id = 1;

UPDATE remote_work_expenses SET reimbursement_amount = reimbursement_amount - 50.25, approval_status = 'Rejected' WHERE id = 3;

UPDATE reimbursements SET amount = amount * 0.9, payment_date = '2022-12-31' WHERE request_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-09-30'
UPDATE approvals SET status = 'Approved' WHERE approval_id IN (SELECT approval_id FROM reimbursements WHERE amount > 5000)
